feed.title: Our World in Data
feed.subtitle: Living conditions around the world are changing rapidly. Explore how and why.

entry.title: We are hiring! Do you want to join our team as a web developer?
entry.summary: We from Our World in Data are currently at Y Combinator in Silicon Valley as one of the few academic non-profits ever to be selected. The experience here helped us to develop a very clear vision for our work in the coming year and it became evident that we can do better if we find one more colleague to work with us.

entry.title: Our World in Data is at Y Combinator
entry.summary: Usually we write to you from Oxford where it’s often cold and dark. Not this time: for 10 weeks this winter we are in California instead.
